description:
The residents of Sunohara House discuss their ideal marriage, Aki and Ayaka fix leaks in the roof, and Ayaka takes care of her residents after they get caught in the rain.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Start of the Rainy Season, Weddings, Lap Pillow
بداية موسم الأمطار / حفلات الزواج / وسادة الركبتين
梅雨いり けっこん 膝枕
